name: gooseGrade
tag_list: correction, spelling, error, media, author, blogging
overview:
gooseGrade.com is the webâ€™s newest way for readers and writers to interact with each other and promises to improve the quality and accuracy of information found online.

The service allows readers to post corrections (grammar, spelling, factual accuracy, and more) to blogs and other online media outlets and will soon be sparking new debates in the blogosphere. These corrections are ultimately tabulated into a â€œgooseGradeâ€ (1 to 100) indicated by a badge on the blog or web site and are ranked accordingly on the gooseGrade.com portal.

Authors, however, maintain complete control over their content and can choose to accept or ignore any suggestion made by a â€œgooseGraderâ€. gooseGraders, likewise, should make their corrections wisely - theyâ€™re being scored, too!

milestones.description: gooseGrade releases browser bookmarklet allowing users to copyedit any web site, not just those with the company's widget installed.
milestones.source_description: gooseGrade Uses Crowdsourcing to Edit Website Copy
